interlinear-text.item:
LGRTXT k'xis ti'imlktx cixnascx k'x-i-s ti-'imlk-tx ci-xnas-cx see-3SG:O-3SG:A REF:PROX:M-man-$ REF:PROX:F-woman-$ The man sees the woman.
sp'tis ti'isimṃɬkitx wawac'uksc sp'-ti-s ti-'isimṃɬki-tx wa-wac'-uks-c hit-3PL:O-3SG:A REF:PROX:M-boy-$ REF:PROX:PL-dog-PL-$ The boy is hitting the dog.
naptis cixnascx wa'imlkuksc xtismɬktx nap-ti-s ci-xnas-cx wa-'imlk-uks-c x-ti-smɬk-tx give-3PL:O-3SG:A REF:PROX:F-woman-$ REF:PROX:PL-man-PL-$ DIR-REF:PROX:M-fish-$ The woman is giving the men the fish.
sp'is cixnascx ti'imlktx xtistntx sp'-i-s ci-xnas-cx ti-'imlk-tx x-ti-stn-tx hit-3SG:O-3SG:A REF:PROX:F-woman-$ REF:PROX:M-man-$ DIR-REF:PROX:M-stick-$ The woman hits the men with the stick.
λ'apaw waλ'mstac λ'ap-aw wa-λ'msta-c go-3PL:S REF:PROX:PL-person-$ The people are going.
staltmxaw wa'imlkuksc staltmx-aw wa-'imlk-uks-c be=chief-3PL:S REF:PROX:PL-man-PL-$ The men are chiefs.
waks tiλ'aptx wak-s ti-λ'ap-tx be=who-3SG:S:GTOP REF:PROX:M-go-$ Who is going? (it's who the going one?)
λ'ap ti'imlktx λ'ap ti-'imlk-tx go:3SG:S REF:PROX:M-man-$ The man is going.
ti'imlktx tiλ'ap ti-'imlk-tx ti-λ'ap REF:PROX:M-man-$ REF:PROX:M-go The one who is going is the man.
waks tisp'is cixnascx wak-s ti-sp'-i-s ci-xnas-cx be=who-3SG:S:GTOP REF:PROX:M-hit-3SG:O-3SG:A REF:PROX:M-woman-$ Whom is hitting the woman?
ti'imlktx tisp'is cixnascx ti'-imlk-tx ti-sp'i-s ci-xnas-cx REF:PROX:M-man-$ REF:PROX:M-hit-3SG:O-3SG:A REF:PROX:F-woman-$ It is the man who is hitting the woman.
sp'is cixnascx ti'imlktx sp'-i-s ci-xnas-cx ti-'imlk-tx hit-3SG:O-3SG:A REF:PROX:F-woman-$ REF:PROX:M-man-$ The woman is hitting the man.
k'xic tiya ti'imlktx k'x-i-c ti-ya ti-'imlk-tx see-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-be=good REF:PROX:M-man-$ I see the good man.
k'xic ti'imlktx tiyatx k'x-i-c ti-'imlk-tx ti-ya-tx see-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-man-$ REF:PROX:M-be=good-$ I see the man, the good one.
k'xic tiya ticacti ti'imlktx k'x-i-c ti-ya ti-cacti ti-'imlk-tx see-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-be=good REF:PROX:M-be=young REF:PROX:M-man-$ I see the good, young man.
k'xic tiλ'ap tiλ'mstatx k'x-i-c ti-λ'ap ti-λ'msta-tx see-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-go REF:PROX:M-man-$ I see the man who is going.
k'xic tiλ'mstatx tiλ'aptx k'x-i-c ti-λ'msta-tx ti-λ'ap-tx see-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-man-$ REF:PROX:M-go-$ I see the man who is going.
k'xic tiλ'msta tiλ'ap 'aɬcixnascx k'x-i-c ti-λ'msta ti-λ'ap 'aɬ-ci-xnas-cx see-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-man REF:PROX:M-go DIR-REF:PROX:F-woman-$ I see the man who is going with the woman.
k'xic tistlmx ti'imlktx k'x-i-c ti-stlmx ti-'imlk-tx see-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-be=chief REF:PROX:M-man-$ I see the man who is chief.
k'xiɬ cixnascx 'n wa'imlkuksc k'x-i-ɬ ci-xnas-cx 'n wa-'imlk-uks-c see-3SG:O-1PL:A REF:PROX:F-woman-$ and REF:PROX:PL-man-PL-$ We see the woman and the men.
k'xtiɬ wa'imlkuksc 'n cixnascx k'x-ti-ɬ wa-'imlk-uks-c 'n ci-xnas-cx see-3PL:O-1PL:A REF:PROX:PL-man-PL-$ and REF:PROX:F-woman-$ Wee see the men and the woman.
'aɬk'yukic ti'imlk ti'aɬpstucwtx 'aɬk'yuk-i-c ti-'imlk ti-'aɬps-tu-cw-tx know-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-man REF:PROX:M-eat-CAUS-2SG:A-$ I know the man whom you feed.
'aɬk'yuktic wa'imlkuks wa'aɬpstutit waxnasuksc 'aɬk'yuk-ti-c wa-'imlk-uks wa-'aɬps-tu-ti-t wa-xnas-uks-c know-3PL:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:PL-man-PL REF:PROX:PL-eat-CAUS-3PL:O-3PL:A REF:PROX:PL-woman-PL-$ I know the men who are feeding the woman.
'aɬk'yukic tisp'cstx 'aɬk'yuk-i-c ti-sp'-c-s-tx know-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-hit-1SG:O-3SG:A-$ I know who is hitting me.
'aɬk'yukic tisp'cttx 'aɬk'yuk-i-c ti-sp'-ct-tx know-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-hit-2SG:O-$ I know who is hitting you. (by whom you are hit)
'aɬk'yukic ti'imlk tisp'ictx 'aɬk'yuk-i-c ti-'imlk ti-sp'-i-c-tx know-3SG:O-1SG:A REF:PROX:M-man REF:PROX:M-hit-3SG:O-1SG:A-$ I know the man whom I am hitting.
txis 'aleks tiq'lsxʷtx tx-i-s 'aleks ti-q'lsxʷ-tx cut-3SG:O-3SG:A Alex REF:PROX:M-rope-$ Alex cuts the rope.
txa 'aleks tiq'lsxʷtx tx-a 'aleks ti-q'lsxʷ-tx cut-INTR:3SG:S Alex DIR-REF:PROX:M-rope-$ Alex is cutting the rope.
qaXla nik qaXla nik drink:3SG:S Nick Nick is drinking.
qaXlamkis nik tistilwatx qaXla-mk-i-s nik ti-stilwa-tx drink-TRANS-3SG:O-3SG:A Nick REF:PROX:M-broth-$ Nick drinks the broth.
qaXlatus klis nik qaXla-tu-s klis nik drink-CAUS-3SG:A Chris Nick Chris makes Nick drink.
txaynixis 'aleks tiq'lsxʷtx tx-ay-nix-i-s 'aleks ti-q'lsxʷ-tx cut-AUX-LC-3SG:O-3SG:A Alex REF:PROX:M-rope-$ Alex accidentally cuts / finally manages to cut the rope.
txanixis pat 'aleks xtiq'lsxʷtx tx-a-nix-i-s pat 'aleks x-ti-q'lsxʷ-tx cut-INDIR-LC-3SG:O-3SG:A Pat Alex DIR-REF:PROX:M-rope-$ Pat thinks that Alex is cutting a rope.
nuyamɬamkis gieg tisiyutnutx nuyamɬ-amk-i-s gieg ti-siyut-nu-tx sing-TRANS-3SG:O-3SG:A Greg REF:PROX:M-be=singing-2SG:S-$ Greg sings your song.
wilaXis vans tistilwatx wil-aX-i-s vans ti-stilwa-tx pour-floor-3SG:O-3SG:A Vance REF:PROX:M-broth-$ Vance pours the broth on the floor.
wilaXaynixis vans tistilwatx wil-aX-ay-nix-i-s vans ti-stilwa-tx pour-floor-AUX-LC-3SG:O-3SG:A Vance REF:PROX:M-broth-$ Vance accidentally pours the broth on the floor.
wilaXlayx vans xtistilwatx wil-aX-layx vans x-ti-stilwa-tx pour-floor-NC:3SG:S Vance DIR-REF:PROX:M-broth-$ Vance spills the broth on the floor.
λ'apskʷc' tanumaw tacactitX λ'ap-s-kʷ-c' ta-nu-maw ta-cacti-tX go-3SG:S:GTOP-QUOT-PERF REF:DIST:M-human-one REF:DIST:M-be=young-$ A certain young man went, they say.
kʷanataw tuxixnasitXʷ 'aɬtXʷ kʷanat-aw tu-xixnas-i-tXʷ 'aɬ-tXʷ cry-3PL:S REF:DIST:F-woman:RED-DIM-$ DIR-DIST The young lady cried then.
slaXakʷtu wamamncis tananmk'tX slaX-a-kʷ-tu wa-mamnc-i-s ta-nanmk'-tX be=many-3PL:S-QUOT-ASS REF:PROX:PL-child:RED-DIM-3SG:S REF:DIST:PL-animal-$ The animal has a lot of children. (His children manied that animal.)
λ'apskʷc' tanumawtX skaqaXlas 'uɬtaqlatXʷ λ'ap-s-kʷ-c' ta-nu-maw-tX s-ka-qaXla-s 'uɬ-ta-qla-tXʷ go-3SG:GTOP-QUOT-PERF REF:DIST:M-human-one-$ NOM-IRR-drink-3SG:GTOP DIR:CONT-REF:DIST:PL-water-$ One of them went to get a drink of water.
sqʷ'nayaXikuciskʷc' taxʷnaɬtX sqʷ'nay-aX-ik-uc-i-s-kʷ-c' ta-xʷnaɬ-tX kneel-behind-long=hor=axis-edge-3SG:O-3SG:A-QUOT-PERF REF:DIST:M-spring-$ He knelt on the ground next to the spring.
λ'apskʷc' c'ayx 'aɬaac ska'mtis λ'ap-s-kʷ-c' c'ayx 'aɬ-a-ac s-ka-'mt-i-s go-3SG:S:GTOP-QUOT-PERF DX:PROX DIR-PROX-now NOM-IRR-sit-DIM-3SG:S She went then and sat down.
ka'aɬ'ayaksc' xac 'uɬaniXʷc ka-'aɬ-'ay-ak-s-c' x-ac 'uɬ-a-niXʷ-c IRR-RES-do-hand-3SG:S-PERF DIR-now DIR:CONT-REF:PROX-fire-$ She would (=and she) now put her hand into the fire.
kukʷis 'aɬta'astxʷtXʷ kukʷ-i-s 'aɬ-ta-'as-txʷ-tXʷ cook-3SG:O-3SG:A DIR-REF:DIST:PL-location-inside-$ He cooked it inside his locations (> house).

phrase.item: The boy is hitting the dog.
The woman is giving the men the fish.
The woman hits the men with the stick.
Who is going? (it's who the going one?)
The one who is going is the man.
It is the man who is hitting the woman.
The woman is hitting the man.
I see the man, the good one.
I see the good, young man.
I see the man who is going.
I see the man who is going.
I see the man who is going with the woman.
I see the man who is chief.
We see the woman and the men.
Wee see the men and the woman.
I know the man whom you feed.
I know the men who are feeding the woman.
I know who is hitting me.
I know who is hitting you. (by whom you are hit)
I know the man whom I am hitting.
Alex accidentally cuts / finally manages to cut the rope.
Pat thinks that Alex is cutting a rope.
Vance pours the broth on the floor.
Vance accidentally pours the broth on the floor.
Vance spills the broth on the floor.
A certain young man went, they say.
The animal has a lot of children. (His children manied that animal.)
One of them went to get a drink of water.
He knelt on the ground next to the spring.
She went then and sat down.
She would (=and she) now put her hand into the fire.
He cooked it inside his locations (> house).
